programme.title: A Thousand Times Good Night
programme.desc: Rebecca is one of the world's top war photographers. She must weather a major emotional storm when her husband and young daughters refuse to put up with her dangerous life any longer. They need Rebecca, who, however, loves both her family and her work.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (1)
programme.desc: A prisoner transfer to Thailand goes horribly wrong for Detectives Mehmet and Mustafa when the pair are kidnapped by a local crime family and Mehmet is forced to break their boss out of prison to save Mustafa’s life.

programme.title: A Tale of Samurai Cooking - A True Love Story
programme.desc: Great cook Haru has married into the legendary “Kitchen Samurai” family. But her husband who is the successor of the Funaki family cannot cook at all. Haru makes a vow to make him a superb samurai chef and starts teaching her new husband how to cook.

programme.title: Blizzard of Souls
programme.desc: After losing his mother and his home, Arturs finds some consolation in joining the army. However, war is nothing like he imagined.

programme.title: Cracks In Concrete
programme.desc: Ertan leaves jail after 10 years and tries to settle back in society. Mikail spends his time with parties, drugs and dreaming of a life as a gangster rapper. Ertan looks for Mikail. Mikail doesn't know Ertan. Soon they must face a harsh reality.

programme.title: Mediterranea
programme.desc: Two men make the dangerous journey from Africa to Italy for a better life but then face hostility and violence in this shocking look at the life-and-death struggle of refugees.

programme.title: Homicide Unit Istanbul: Thailand (2)
programme.desc: With his colleague’s life on the line, Inspector Mehmet has to bust Thai crime boss Worawit out of jail. But an ambush by the Red Dragon gang leaves Worawit kidnapped and Mehmet injured and semi-conscious. How will Mehmet save his colleague now?

programme.title: Abandoned Skies
programme.desc: A cargo plane pilot is trapped alone with his plane in Earth orbit due to a nuclear war. Until one day he found someone else’s connection in space.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 1: Done Is Done
programme.desc: Shelly Mohan, a housewife and mother of three, makes an irreparable decision and commits a horrific act when Charlie Lynch, a man from her troubled past, contacts her.

programme.title: Clean Sweep 2: Post Mortem
programme.desc: Shelly's husband Jason, a Garda Detective, is delighted to be assigned to the case, with no sense where the trail may lead. While he and his co-worker, Fiona, focus on a sex worker, Shelly realizes she may have left evidence in the dead man's hotel room.

programme.title: Ghost Mountaineer
programme.desc: In the former Soviet Union, a group of Estonian students go hiking in Siberia. After their unpopular leader Olle vanishes, his rival Eero leads the group to seek help, and a series of bizarre and terrifying events unfold.

programme.title: Dad Got Grounded
programme.desc: Paul is a great pilot, but after breaking his promise to retire early to care for their son, his wife leaves him. Faced with having to take care of their son and his two other children by himself, Paul must show that he is a good father to win her back.

programme.title: Run To You
programme.desc: Gianni is a serial seducer, but his life is destined to change when he meets Chiara, a beautiful woman who has had an accident and is paraplegic.

programme.title: Murder in Ramatuelle
programme.desc: When wine estate owner Sébastien Lacassagne is found murdered in his home, Prosecutor Elisabeth Richard and Captain Caroline Martinez delve into his tangled past. As secrets unravel, a year-old disappearance emerges as the key to unlocking the truth.

programme.title: Shenanigans
programme.desc: A mischievous young boy gets a bad school result and he decides to lie to his mom. Nhan thought everything is going well until his teacher calls his mom.

programme.title: The Breach
programme.desc: A fatal car crash shudders a crisis-torn family. Completely lost and shaken to the core by his wife’s death, the husband undertakes his own investigation and learns the shattering truth about his spouse’s genuine woes and longings.
